hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(CodigoElemento as varchar(2000)))) as "codigo", rtrim(CAST(DescripcionLocal as varchar)) as "nombre" from MA_MiscelaneosDetalle where AplicacionCodigo = :p_aplicacion and CodigoTabla = :p_codigotabla and Compania = :p_compania and Estado = ISNULL(:p_estado,Estado)

select aplicacioncodigo as "aplicacioncodigo", codigotabla as "codigotabla", compania as "compania", LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(CodigoElemento as varchar))) as "codigoelemento", CAST(DescripcionLocal as varchar(2000)) as "descripcionlocal", CAST(estado as varchar(1)) as "estado", descripcionextranjera as "descripcionextranjera", valornumerico as "valornumerico", valorfecha as "valorfecha", ultimousuario as "ultimousuario", ultimafechamodif as "ultimafechamodif", valorcodigo1 as valorcodigo1, valorcodigo2 as valorcodigo2, valorcodigo3 as valorcodigo3 From ma_miscelaneosdetalle where aplicacioncodigo = :p_aplicacioncodigo and codigotabla = :p_codigotabla and compania = :p_compania and codigoelemento = :p_codigoelemento

select aplicacioncodigo as "aplicacioncodigo", codigotabla as "codigotabla", compania as "compania", LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(CodigoElemento as varchar))) as "codigoelemento", CAST(DescripcionLocal as varchar(2000)) as "descripcionlocal", CAST(estado as varchar(1)) as "estado", valorcodigo1 as "valorcodigo1", valornumerico as "valornumerico" From ma_miscelaneosdetalle where aplicacioncodigo = :p_aplicacioncodigo and codigotabla = :p_codigotabla and compania = :p_compania and UPPER(codigoelemento) like '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_codigoelemento, codigoelemento )) + '%' and UPPER(estado) like '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_estado, estado )) + '%' and UPPER(descripcionlocal) like '%' + UPPER(ISNULL(:p_descripcionlocal, descripcionlocal )) + '%'
